stories.text:
Hello HN Network - we're in need of a new credit card for our 20 person hybrid (50% in person 50% remote) employee base. We're a technology business selling a SaaS and IoT products.

Does anyone have recent experience they'd like to offer with Brex or all the alternatives out there? The space moves so quickly and I fear the marketing websites on these may not always line up with the reality of the card programs.

value drivers we're interested in;

  - ~2% or more cash back
  - Web dashboard to manage employee cards and spending limits
  - Web tools to make it easy for our accountants to reconcile statements with QBO
  - "Positive Pay" or just completely single-use cards where the numbers can be generated online without much consequence.
Thanks in advance for any honest links or feedback.
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Credit Card for ~20 person Company?
